output.sentences: Finishing up their honeymoon, the newlyweds asked someone to take their picture on the boat.
The patron was able to take their picture before the camera fell into the ocean.
The newly married husband was a deep sea diver and jumped overboard to save the camera and their memories on pictures.
His new wife grabbed an inner tube while she and the shutterbug butterfingers pulled him back to the boat.
The husband was able to save the camera. But their last picture was the only one not corrupted: they now have a funny story to tell.
